SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.cloud

Interface ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin extends InternalPlugin
ICloudRetrievePolicyPlugin represents the interface to an external system that performs a retrieval of policy JSON string

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PolicySummary
    convertPolicyToSummary(Policy policy)
    Converts the Policy into a PolicySummary.
    String
    getPolicyGraph(@NotNull PolicySummary policySummary)
    Returns a string of well formatted JSON that matches the schema as defined by 'Policy' on 'ext.claim.v1.claim_graph_combined-1.0'.
    boolean
    shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType(PolicyType policyType)
    Determines whether getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary) should be used for retrieving the the policy

  • Method Details

    • getPolicyGraph

      String getPolicyGraph(@NotNull @NotNull PolicySummary policySummary)
      Returns a string of well formatted JSON that matches the schema as defined by 'Policy' on 'ext.claim.v1.claim_graph_combined-1.0'. The code that calls this method will parse this string and validate it against that schema, then it will use the Cloud API graph updater to convert the JSON into an Policy and its children
      Parameters:
      policySummary - The policy summary that represents the policy to retrieve
      Returns:
      a JSON string that represents the policy graph for that policy

    • shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType

      boolean shouldUseGraphRetrieveForPolicyType(PolicyType policyType)
      Determines whether getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary) should be used for retrieving the the policy
      Parameters:
      policyType - the policy type of the policy that will be retrieved

    • convertPolicyToSummary

      PolicySummary convertPolicyToSummary(Policy policy)
      Converts the Policy into a PolicySummary. The constructed PolicySummary objects are very minimal, with just the bare minimum of information needed to retrieve the policy graph using getPolicyGraph(PolicySummary)
